mapper.select: SELECT ledLed.LEDID AS "ledid", ledStation.GLID AS "glid", ledStation.XLMC AS "xlmc", ledStation.XLBH AS "xlbh", ledStation.FX AS "fxbm", ledSjzd.ZDBM AS "fx", ledStation.ZDMC AS "zdmc", ledStation.ZDBH AS "zdbh", ledStation.DQZX AS "dqzx", ledStation.ZPXSSX AS "zpxssx", ledStation.ZDTK AS "zdtk", ledStation.QYZT AS "qyzd", ledLed.ledbh AS "ledbh" FROM LED_LED ledLed JOIN LED_STATION ledStation ON ledled.LEDID = ledStation.LEDID JOIN LED_SJZD ledSjzd ON ledSjzd.pzdbm = '16' AND ledStation.FX = ledSjzd.zdbm AND LEDSTATION.XLBH = #{xlbh} AND LEDSTATION.ZDBH = #{zdbh} ORDER BY LEDSTATION.ZPXSSX ASC

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO LED_STATION ( GLID, XLMC, XLBH, FX, ZDMC, ZDBH, DQZX, ZPXSSX, LEDID ,ZDTK ,QYZT ) VALUES ( SYS_GUID (), #{map.xlmc}, #{map.xlbh}, #{map.fx}, #{map.zdmc}, #{map.zdbh}, #{map.dqzx}, #{map.zpxssx}, #{map.ledid} ,#{map.zdtk} ,#{map.qyzd} )

mapper.update: UPDATE LED_STATION SET XLMC = #{xlmc}, XLBH = #{xlbh}, FX = #{fx}, ZDMC = #{zdmc}, ZDBH = #{zdbh}, DQZX = #{dqzx}, ZPXSSX = #{zpxssx}, ZDTK = #{zdtk}, QYZT = #{qyzd} WHERE GLID = #{glid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LED_STATION where LEDID IN #{item}
